doc_desc.title: National Income Dynamics Study (NIDS) - Waves 1-5 Complete Dataset

producers.name: Southern Africa Labour and Development Research Unit

version_statement.version_notes: Full dataset with harmonized mental health variables across all waves (Stata format)

study_info.abstract: Complete NIDS dataset covering Waves 1-5 from 2008-2017 with harmonized variables. Contains individual-level and household-level data on income, employment, education, health, and social outcomes with enhanced mental health variables for harmonization across research instruments. Data available in Stata 14 format.
study_info.geog_coverage: Nationally representative covering all 9 provinces with urban and rural representation
study_info.data_kind: Longitudinal panel survey in Stata format
study_info.universe: Household members aged 15+ across South Africa tracked over 9 years
